short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: While browsing other flights booking sites, you can get notifications for cheaper prices to save money.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BFF is an automated flight search tool that scours hundreds of OTA and airline websites to find the best and most cost-effective flight offers, while you browse for flight tickets online. If a cheaper or better pricing option is available from another OTA/airline, BFF will notify you and you can easily switch to the better option with just one click.

Terms&Conditions: https://www.travelgo.com/en-us/common/terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy: https://www.travelgo.com/en-us/common/privacy-policy
